Posts.Content: I just read your post and now realise what's causing the pain in my arm.First I had pain in my hand and now the pain is all through my arm I too thought I had slept on It.This has happened after my second Fec and I'm due for my third next week and im worrying how that will effect the arm. I'm sorry I carnt answer your post but I m trying to find out as much information as possible xx
Posts.Title: Sore arm from chemo
